content: If I could give it 0 stars I would. With the last update I started getting so many pop up ads on my phone that it became nearly impossible to use. I would literally get one every 10-15 seconds. Virus scans turned up nothing. Then I noticed that every ad I was getting was related to this app. I uninstalled the update and haven't had a pop up since. I can understand why advertising is necessary but when I can't make a phone call or even check the time because of the ads it gets ridiculous.

I cannot get this app to work, s8+. The search bar is unresponsive. I tap it but can not get it to invoke the keyboard to enter my search. If I rotate screen I can get it to work. I Uninstaller all updates, cleared data, reinstalled no luck. I use the older app and it works fine. But have received notice it will not be supported going forward. I would love for the app to work on my phone. Hopefully it will work on s10+

The app is alright, a bit buggy. The issue is the barely intelligible outsourced customer support and inconsistant package tracking. Paid for overnight deliver, took a week. ( Package lost somehow) Asked for refund in amazon credit, 3 hours to get credit, since a new item would not be available for several weeks. Ended up getting refunded to my card, 7-10 business days to clear.

It's constantly freezing. I'm always putting in a "fix" request but obviously it's getting ignored because this has gone on now for months. It doesn't matter if it's the shopping app or Prime video. None of my other apps have given me any problems . Easier just to delete them anyway than the hassle it's been giving me, including the horrible delivery service lately.

I love amazon but this app is really disappointing. it constantly crashes and gives me an error screen that says "Oops, something went wrong." This seems to happen everytime I attempt to view a product or view different sizes/colors/options of products. I have used this app for a long time and no matter how many times it updates this problem occurs repeatedly.

I got this app since I use amazon a lot , and I regret it. I had a perfectly fine time using chrome instead. I've had times where it crashes repeatedly and it will keep saying "Oops, something went wrong", as much as like 10 times in the same minute. It just gets frustrating after a while, it becomes such a hassle to get what I need when that pops up so frequently. Uninstalling and heading back to chrome.

*Edit: Seems like if you're not a Prime member, the app response is broken: it was laggy from the start (when I had a membership) but then it just became completely unresponsive & I have to tap something on the UI 4 times before anything happens, & that's with WiFi connection. 2ndly, the app offered me a free 12 month Prime trial, but after signing up for it, I instead got just 30 days, then after that trial ended, got billed $130 for a yr subscript. Ha! Lastly, billing reminders do *not work.

I use this app once a week and it's awful. I find I have to flip to the browser version half the time just to get around its horrible ability to search. Its search is so weighted and verging to outright lying to you. from not finding products, to hiding them deep in a list. the same criteria on the website will give you a very diffrent picture. I still use this app for a few convenient things, but never for research.

Can't say how often I open Amazon through a notification, try to switch apps to research the item and then try to switch back to Amazon only to find it's not open in the background. Was just going to submit a question about an item, but jumped to chrome to check facts and couldn't get back to Amazon app to submit my question. ugh... now i have to go find the item and type question again. Also, I'm certain I've reviewed some items via the app in the past that no longer have my reviews.

i got this app for the $10 code, only to google (b.c the ad/info for it disappears as soon as you click it& it takes you to the app store..) and find out it'll be emailed to me within 7-10 days.. thx, i wanted to use it now. they can send a payment email in 3 seconds, but that takes 7days..?? I've never had a problem w. my payment method before, and I seldomly use amazon but with the app it wouldnt accept payment, so i went onto the website and it worked fine. a complete waste of my time, imho.

Usually a great app, but I'm forced to uninstall it and just use browser version. I have the endless dog error page loop. I've cleared cache and local storage and uninstall / reinstalled the app with no luck. If this was temporary it wouldn't be a huge deal. However, so far it's been at least a week that way. Which is just disappointing

Overall good app. Baby registry is very annoying to use though. When I click an item on my registry, (to view detail, to delete or change item setting) and then click back, it sends be all the way back the top of the registry. So I keep having to scroll back down to wgere I was at. It's very annoying!!! It's easier to use on a computer than the app.

Was a good and efficient app, but since the update it does not work at all. Cannot open this app...as soon as I click on it it says that app has crashed for some reason. Then when I open amazon music, the first message that pops up is "amazon shopping app has crashed" even though I haven't even opened the amazon shopping app and made sure it wasn't running in the background. Needs to be fixed, but as of now it is a useless waste of space.

Terrible! Horrible! The worse! Couldn't actually log on. There's so many security prompts I couldn't get pass the sign in. You have to verify your log on id and password with a 5 digit code after you verify a copy code but they send it to you in an email not a code key. The app doesn't let you toggle between apps. If you minimize the AMZ app after you hit "send code" to access your acct email, when you come back to it the sign in function starts over again. It literally just keeps sending codes.

Poorly executed app. It will not show your orders or purchase history unless you order directly from the app, which makes the app useless. I use my PC and Chrome on my phone sometimes, as well, and both provide a far superior experience. The app doesn't even recognize my Prime membership, even though I'm logged in. My PC and phone do. Until Amazon fixes this, I will not be using the app.

Amazing online shopping app but I just hated the delayed items. I feel cheated when an item is being delay for a few more days especially when it is a two day shipping item. I do understand that the weather can play a huge role in it but come on. the weather has been nice all week. There are no snow. I'm just probably upset about it, but I will update on my review after more experiences.

The app itself is buggy as heck on my Galaxy Note 4. The buy it now and add to list buttons rarely function without closing the app and reopening it. It often freezes up. My phone is not the newest version, no. However, thats no excuse. Amazon's app is the most buggy app I've ever downloaded on this phone. Unacceptable, for this to come from such a company as Amazon, whose standards should be extremely high. Everything else about Amazon, however, is top notch. Its just this app is horrible.

(Informational Purposes Only) (Dev Please Read) I have been in long standing with this app on my phone for quick purchases, however, now this has come to a hault due to the fact that it has become too demanding with hyperlinks and ads for items within the Amazon shopping ecosystem, making it hard to purchase, search, and or add to a list without being forced to use my desktop to add something. My suggestion, limit the links and ads and or add a "Suggested" tab... please and thank you in advance.

Nice for online shopping. The only big problem is when I surf on the Flash sales page: some pictures are disappearing while scrolling. Like 10-20 items have a problem, then the next pictures are there for like 10-20 items. Then again, no pictures, pictures back, no pictures, pictures back,... It's not practical (and that's since a while). Nexus 5x user

This app has taken a nose dive. I'm a long time Amazon user, and lately, starting up the app and clicking the SEARCH FUNCTION causes it to crash IMMEDIATELY. I can view my old orders just fine, but anytime I try to use the SEARCH FUNCTION causes the app to crash WITHOUT FAIL. You can imagine how frustrating that can be. FIX THIS.

Yes it is possible to make purchases on this app. However, it is near impossible to navigate because of the intense lag. It goes so slow, and is so buggy that often times you have to close the app and open it again to get the buttons to work. I highly advise you to just order off of the desktop website. Needs a LOT of work.

PROBLEM: can't create an account with the email you desire on mobile, otherwise gets "internal error" every time. it SEEMS like it has to be account matching one used to download the app on google play, as that's the only way i got it to work. Was this intentional? because this just makes zero sense to me. I assume this is why some people with existing accounts are having trouble signing in now as well. Please fix!

Dirty tactics. Every time I use the app they ask me to sign up for Prime, which is fine. What's not fine is they make it a one touch purchase and don't ask me to confirm it. This makes it easy to accidentally sign up but to cancel it after accidentally buying it is a pain and not easy to do. Of course they make the option to bypass Prime really small and right next to the buy Prime button so it's easy to fat finger it and select the wrong option. Stop being a-holes Amazon!

When I want to search for something specific such as pastel striped jumper I end up having to scour through all sorts of irrelevant clothes. Hardly any of which are pastel striped jumpers. For this reason I mostly use ebay. Really quite frustrating and I imagine as a seller it must be quite bad that other items come up before theirs that have no relevance to what a buyer has typed into the search bar

I had my app for a few years now and always five stars but this is the second time I had to uninstall and reinstall due to some error that disallow me from launching it. I have a note 8 for a year now and this happened twice within 2 months. hopefully this reinstall will be the last.

The app itself if usually fine. I've had a couple issues with it freezing. I've had most issues with products that use UPS for shipping. Avoid them. UPS won't deliver your package on time and say they missed you even if you spent the entire day home waiting. Nightmare! I won't be buying products with that carrier again.

Latest update very annoying! No option to filter deals any more. Rather than endlessly scrolling through, next and previous buttons appeared. an only problem with this is that it takes me back to the top of the list every time I go to next page. Totally puts me off looking at Prime and Today's Deals.

Amazon activated a Prime Account for me without my consent three times. I called each time to cancel and get a refund. On this last transaction, Amazon didn't show that the Prime Account was active. It was on my back statement so that was very deceptive. It is difficult to understand the broken English of the call taker and inconvenient to take the time in making the call.

I love this app and all that comes with prime, but lately I can not search through tye reviews or ask a question on specific products like I have in the years before. which sucks when you only want to buy a specific dvd if it has several languages on it and amazons language section is often incorrect. always seems to say it just has english when it will also have spanish and/or french. which would be the only reason I would buy most dvds.

This app is essential for those interested. I myself order from amazon."RARELY"I had become an affiliate with amazon using all I had. Maxed out credit-cards.They stated It's a great way to subsitute ones income.Thats not true in my case.My becoming an affiliate with amazon. paid for but nothing ever surfaced. praying that something good would come from Amazon as I trusted them. I'm a mom of 2 with MS who's lost much to Amazon hoping for a solution to stay financially stable without loss.

For many reasons, Amazon is my personal department store & where I often shop for groceries. I can find products on Amazon that friends cannot where they shop. The prices are fair. The quality is great. Prime Now, and Prime Pantry are my go to apps. The mail delivery is always prompt,, and the contents arrive in good condition.

Installed the app as finally fed up of clicking ads for Amazon that open Play not the website however it just won't load. I get a white screen for ages and then the error that the app has stopped working - it never even started. Amazon, you're quite possibly missing out on Sales by pushing app downloads instead of product page visits!!!

Lately the app won't auto focus when scanning a barcode. My work around is to minimize it, open my phones integrated camera app. Wait for it to auto focus, switch to the Amazon app so it can take advantage of how the lens is focused. This is the only way can get it to scan a barcode.

iIlike the app. However, ive been getting random glitching where part of my screen keep flashing black. Only does this in the app . Im concern for a virus or something so i only order on my computer. Ive uninstalled and reinstalled multiple time. Ive even chevk my phone for viruses. i cannot find anything thats causing it . Please see if there any bugs. Its the only app in my phone that glitches. I wont be using it anytime soon.

Amazon is honestly terrible.. prime membership is a waste of money you're always getting ripped off. why cant we filter by things that only deliver to us instead of having to look through 3990 items that dont to find one that does?? Amazon really really really needs to step up honestly the only good thing about Amazon is the shipping times. other than that I would suggest shopping elsewhere cause they clearly are just money hungry and dont listen to their consumers.

first time trying to use the app to purchase a few book. I cant even get to the check out as the app keeps kicking me off saying "oops something went wrong". absolutely ridiculous! the same items I want are on Ebay but are a few dollars more. I NEVER have issues with Ebay think I'll just spend the extra money and buy there. figured I would try to save a few bucks but not if the app cant even function right! waist of time!

I have used this app once since I was forced to move over to it from the old version. I received an order this week that I never placed. I have two similar items sitting in my cart, but I haven't gone through the checkout process and they're still there. So far, I'm not impressed with this app.
Slow to load, if it loads, most of the time it crashes at the beginning. Can't use it at all, no update fix it, and the silly part, is that I'm using a BLU Amazon-ready phone.

Not as good as it used to be. Prime delivery sometimes takes 3 days rather than next day delivery. Searching for products is less streamlined than it used to be - some products say a ridiculous price range meaning it's impossible to use the search engine for your budget.

always gives me the dog error saying "oops! it must be something from our end" RETURN TO HOME but the error still occurs and the app always freezes or the page reloads and i lose progress, it is not a fluid app and im surprised given Amazon's resources

I downloaded this app bc I got a message on my browser offering a $10 coupon to sign into the app. I signed in, got a notification to claim my coupon, was told it would be automatically applied to my next order, and then it disappeared. Nobody can help me, no record. nothing. Such a scam way of getting people to download their app.

Saved Christmas gift cards for 2 years, then when i found something i wanted and had enough money saved up, i tried to use the gift card. Amazon locked my account and when i called customer service they said they couldnt open my account because it was sent to their fraud department and they refused to transfer me there to verify it was me making the purchase on my account. They also told me it would be 3 days before they could verify my purchase was me. No more Amazon gift cards for me!!

I bought an xbox x and upgraded to prime for two days shipping they guaranteed it would arrive by today at 8pm and now that my son is almost home from texas and gets one week with me they say it wont be until Wednesday. I say false advertising I deleted prime. I'm not paying 12.99 for false advertising. yes I should have done it sooner but I didn't have the money. I thought you guys could have saved me time and money but I should have used someone else

Pushes Prime every time you open the app - I accidentally clicked the first button on the home screen and my card was immediately charged. Super shady in my opinion and extremely annoying. I know about amazon prime already and I'll get it if I want to.

SCAM. I DL it because had created an Amazon account for the 1st time to try free prime, I got an ad saying that if I DL this app, I would get $10 off my 1st order. DL the app, get email with the 'coupon'. Read terms conditions. I got 23ish in my cart of prime items and there was no way to apply the coupon like the ad said. Contact support. They say it's in store credit for next order. I say cancel, they say they will crdit my Visa money directly. Make purchase, now they have my cash won't honor.

Amazon has got to have hands down the best customer service & reliability when it comes to recieving your items & items being as described. I've been a prime member for years & prefer to buy it on Amazon if I can. I love that u also get free 2 day shipping as a prime member!

I can't even remove this app from my phone... it says "disable" instead of "uninstall". Honestly I didn't think things were quite this bad on the Android side of the smartphone market, yet here we are. I've got a whole host of Amazon apps on this LG phone, thanks to some lame deal with stupid Sprint. What a mess.

unacceptable I was satisfied buntil now! But the customer service is just unacceptable. I have tried reaching them via Phone and they did not pick up (germany) so instead I had to call the amazon company in Washington, which cost me money and time. asked for a callback and never received one. My item hasnt arrived eventho they claim it did. There is just no way of contacting them.

Decent app, if you don't mind getting scammed whenever the free Prime is up. They don't notify you whenever you're Prime is about to be up, even if you select the option. Just another way for them to make money off of unsuspecting people who don't pay close attention.

Love the simplicity of having everything at my fingertips through the app. No more going on the computer to try to find stuff, and I love the instant notifications through the app when my items are bought and shipped. Thanks!

why on earth would amazon introduce a new app and not provide a way to completely remove the old app that was factory installed on my phone. i now have 200mb of storage tied up with a useless, unremovable app, that came on my phone. when i replace my phone, and if it has an app from amazon that cannot be completely unistalled....i will be cancelling my amazon account... i just ordered an item that said was to deliver today....and now the tracking info says delivery is tomorrow...????

This is the shittiest app ever. The point of this app is supposed to be ease of use and convenience. Except that it makes me log in my card info again when I have yet to return a single item. Also the old amazon app wont uninstall so I have two versions taking up valuable space on my phone. It takes you out of your search to show you bs you dont want. I hate this mfing app. Just useless. Im taking my business to Alibaba.

Selecting products is easy. Getting the products delivered to the correct address is another story. I have no mailbox at my home address, but do have a US PO Box. The Amazon format insists on a physical address where there is no mailbox, but does not allow me to put the PO Box number on the address line. My packages are returned to sender, get delivered to people I don't know, disappear, etc. Its happened 7 times in a row. I'm very upset & disappointed. Very poor planning on Amazon's part

I love Prime! It is worth every penny and has more than paid for itself. I have yet to b disappointed in my shopping or returns. We just spent a couple hours at the mall to buy Jean's for my husband. Couldn't find his size. Came home found them on Amazon and he even had a choice of colors.

my first time ever ordering from Amazon. I needed my washer part today and paid extra to have it by today 3/2/19 and it didnt show up. now they are saying it might be sunday thru Tuesday?!? I ordered I think 5 items. but it took 3 different shipments.I got amazon prime to be able to receive sooner! I'm so dissatisfied and disappointed!!! I definitely will cancel my subscription & wont order from them again! my step dad orders from them & has had problems lately

i placed an order tgree days ago, paid for two day shipping and n the day it was suppose to ship i got a message saying insufficient funds, so when i went to fix this it said it was going to take 3 more days, so instead i paid another $30+ to get my stuff tomorrow. i will never buy from Amazon again this is unfair i paid for two day shipping n nos i hadto spend another $30. never again. they did get me a refund but because they did what they did i was overdrawn in my account. thanks again ,ðŸ™„ðŸ˜’

order hulu directly from hulu not amazon, hulu has far better customer service. amazon makes spending $ very easy, cancelling subscriptions comically difficult. you'll have to talk to several people on the phone several times. if you cancel a service before your prepaid period is over, good luck getting the balance of your $ back. your service though will be promptly discontinued.
grr, its so frustrating that this app keeps giving an error every time you are viewing a particular item. the dog pictures are cute, but do not make up for the total lack of functionality.
Since the update, I open the app and it's just blank/or crashes. I've had to go to Amazon on Chrome so it defeats the purpose of the app. If this isn't improved soon, I'm uninstalling.

Amazon likes to play games...they pop up advertising to download their App and receive a $10 gift card... it's never given...then you call customer service and they tell you they dont see you've downloaded the App...so I ask to be transferred to the Tech Support Dept....no such thing...how can you have a website advertising merchandise and not have a Tech Support Dept? it's 2019! smh

Overall love the app, but lately it keeps crashing as I go to the checkout pages to set the delivery address and choose the delivery method, each time I want to order something have to go on my computer and do it.
Intrusive. Does not offer anything apart from what a browser does. Retrieves data and bothers you with messages. Hard to find items in departments. A complete failure.
Very slow and unresponsive. Doesnt allow me to add items to my cart or lists without taking 5 or more minutes and then after waiting its just crashes. Very annoying....

The website itself is fine, but the app is very buggy, crashes all the time even after several reinstallments. Used to work fine idk whats happened since then but I don't like it now. I'll just stick to using the website.

Was an Amazon customer but never again. They tricked me into buying an Audio book. On the Amazon UK site they offered me two free audible for a trial period. So I chose one and while following the steps, they took me to the US site which doesn't offer free audible. So they charged my credit card. What a nice slight of hand Amazon.

Worked great up until about a month ago, now it won't scroll through the results of a search... I have to swipe 10 times to get to the next item. I guess I'll be using ebay instead as I don't have the patience to deal with a non functional app!!!
A bit laggy. I have prime and a few lists, but I don't see why it's so slow sometimes. Adding an item to my cart takes two presses and sometimes still doesn't "take."

This app is complete garbage now. You can't click on things like images, sizes, or color options, so you have to keep going back and clicking the product again hoping one of these times this trash app will actually work. DO NOT USE THIS APP ANYMORE, IT IS ABSOLUTELY BROKEN

This app is horrible and it doesn't work on my new pixel phone. Amazon won't work when i am connected to the internet, but as soon as i turn it off and disconnect from the internet, it works fine. i am beyond frustrated ðŸ˜ ðŸ˜  and i don't know what the problem is or how to fix it!!!!!

I used to really Love Amazon but Amazon is getting really greedy lately! Since becoming a Prime Member last year, I used to have access to all the great benfits, Prime Pantry, Music, two Day Shipping ect. Now, Amazon wants you to pay seperately for Prime Pantry. I refuse to do so. It was already part of my Prime experiance. I also have trouble with getting my packages within two days. Music is seperate too. No Thanks. Got rid of Prime Panty, and Music. About to loose Prime all together.

I love the app and everything but the one thing they messed up on is the buy with 1 click. that button causes mayhem mainly because you might accidentally hit it and then you have to cancel as fast as you can

Love this App. I can find pretty much anything I look for, great deals, I'm a Prime Member so I get free shipping on certain orders, fast delivery, and my orders are backed by a money back guarantee, I also get to watch videos with my Prime Membership for free. I love love love Amazon
Love this app and use it all the time!! However, my drop and drag wish list tray has disappeared, and I'm unable to find any recent information on-line regarding how it can be restored. Help!

Only works for me 50% of the time. Freezes often. Its hard to shop and enjoy this app, it becomes very stressful. This is the only app I have issues with. Refreshing and updates dont help! I almost hate it. Happens more when Im on wifi.

im getting a debit order evey month from amazon with out i order nothing i just opened an account they started talking money form my account and they won't give an update... again on the 20.03.2019 they debit from my account now i need to go to the bank and report this problem. so guys don't scan your card with this scam. they debit form my account 3 times with out i place an order
Not impressed that with a recent update because if I have my ad blocker on, nothing in the app works...Can't search and mostly nothing loads. Took me a while to figure that out so super annoyed.

very intrusive... even though I dont search for it in the app, it knows what I have searched for in my browser and text message communications and will email me "deals" on items like such. deleting app cuz I dont trust it

Always a terrible experience. Nothing ever shows up on time. Packages are sent to random houses and I'm sent a picture of some random doorstep with my package sitting on it. Theres a million better services out there. Don't limit yourself to this one.

well workin app, great customer service, its not perfect but the good service and straight forward layout outweighs the glitches that happen to your order history if you excessively order things in a short period of time.
Love this app. You can purchase and have either delivered to you or someone else. Items are very well priced with good quality. If you're on a special diet, great variety and less expensive.

very very very slow for no absolute reason will suddenly freeze and afterwards get out of control out of the random the screen may suddenly turn pitch black very high prices for a small thing for example the cheapest silicon wisk that i could find cost me 5 to 6 dollars plus taxes

My husband didn't receive 2 items(shipped together) so he messaged amazon and instead of helping us (refund, resend or checking delivery on there end) they cancelled his whole account! Not helpful at all and very rude wouldnt answer a single question! horrible customer service!

i got the app based on an advertisement for $10 off first purchase through app. i was suppose to receive a notification within 3-5 days. its been 2 weeks and still nothing and customer service has no clue what im talking about. they want proof and the advertisement thay was on this play store is now gone!

Ever since I contacted my bank about being charged without permission for Amazon Prime. Amazon will not accept me paying for anything with bank account anymore. which really sucks cause I dont want a new bank account and now I cant buy anything off of Amazon without havening to ask someone to buy it for me. I really wish businesses wouldn't be so selfish.

I'm tired of this app being a glorified wrapper of the mobile website. There's a lot you can miss using this app versus the mobile and desktop experiences that it's insane this still exists in some form.

deleted the old prime app which worked perfectly for this as instructed and now can't watch Prime Videos, just crashes the app. I'm on latest version, needs an urgent update! love Amazon and Prime but come on devs, sort your app out especially if the old one is obsolete now....

Absolutely love this app! Convenient and easy to use. I love using subscribe and save, though I'm not sure I'm actually saving any money. Having it delivered right to my door is what it like the most.
Great app! Very minor problems such as navigating through reviews is a little cumbersome and pictures not loading when you click on them to zoom in.
I like shopping on Amazon but do not like their "This item is eligible for free UK delivery" claim as this is subject to so many different eligibility clauses that you end up paying anyway!
Overall it is a good shopping. Unfortunately sometimes it searches and brings up stuff that really has nothing to do with the item I am interested in.

i use this a LOT, and they have really messed up the todays deals section. I cant add deals to be watched, and cant bring up watched deals added on another machine. They REALLY need to make deals searchable!

I would give 0 stars if i could. ive been wronged multiple times in the past 2 weeks. First i bought a strut for my car which took 3 weeks to ship and when it got to me, it was in a giant box with no cushioning so the item was broken when it got here. Now its gonna take another month to ship to me. And i use my car for my job. Then I bought a cage for my ferrets, which was from prime and was expected the 14th by 8. after that day i checked the delivery status and it was shipped 4 states over.

i love amazon but the latest update is getting on my nerves. If you search for an item then choose low to high it can go from 10000 results to 100 results its not showing add on items or low priced items

When trying to pay with iDeal on mobile, the iDeal app will not open and you have to pay using your random reader. The reason I want to pay with mobile is because I don't carry my reader everywhere I go. This is very inconvenient.

During search nothing is happening. I can look at stuff under categories. As soon I try to go to the next page it goes to a white screen and nothing happens. I just became a prime member and I can't even look for products I need.

every time I try to order something it just gives me a hassle. I am 60 years old and you know what some people need guidance. I hate this completely pain in the ass with the password all. Here's an idea provide a number where you can help people who could not care less at being tech savvy but just want to buy things

my $10 credit for installing the app appeared as popup on my phone but when I went to my account, It was nowhere to be see. Customer service was insolent and swore there was no such credit program. I am furious about this.

They have everything. But the shipping is consistently poor. I get used items sold as new. Don't even bother with customer service. A poor example of American business. Good luck if you speak English.

I love the app and use it 24/7. I tried to leave a few reviews... they seem to have qualities required for a review and they are rejected?? I've had my account for years and I believe I reach the "pay wall" to post reviews...Can I have a non-automated reason? It's so tiresome when trying to give GOOD feedback...I wrote a review for a recent order, it was rejected, then I get an email later asking me to write a review for the same order?? It's like wow, thx for wasting my time. Won't do it again.
This is by far the worst app on my phone. It's borderline unusable-- slow, laggy, crashes constantly, and just a nightmare to use. I'm actually shocked that Amazon would make app this bad

Is the intresting finds being updated correctly? When I open it, it still has things from over a month ago listed, and it says "updated daily" right at the top.Is there a problem on my end,or with the app? (I've tried updating the app itself,nothing changes)
Easy, but the frustrating part is adding items to lists. Suddenly EVERYTHING copies onto multiple lists, which defeats the purpose of having more than one.
it hasn't worked for nearly a year now no matter how many times update it or uninstall and reinstall i can't buy anything with it. as soon as i click add to cart, i get an error message.
Probably the last update did it - the app used to be 5 stars but is now broken. crashes within a minute of loading - consistently. Useless. Not even worth one star in this state.
ever since my app update there are parts of my screen that go black at times when using the app but stops when i shut down and restart the app. very annoying.

great marketing. they remember what you looked at. suggest similar items. service is also great. vendors hop to if they don't deliver. one failed to send me an item Google helped me send a text complaining. vendor apologized returned my money and later sent me the item free
Does not work, for over a month I get the weird dog photo with a sorry message everytime I click on anything. and Yes I have uninstalled and reinstalled the app, with no improvement.
